.entry-header
about us
Orange Park Mall is Clay County‚Äôs premier shopping destination offering national brands and locally-owned specialty shops to residents and tourists alike. Orange Park Mall also hosts more than 30 events a year including, a monthly KidX Club event, car shows and and Photos with the Easter Bunny and Santa.
Connect with us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
and
sign up
to receive Orange Park Mall‚Äôs emails for the latest news and happenings!
photo gallery
PARKING & ACCESSIBILITY
bicycle parking
Bike racks are located at the Food Court entrance and the Old Navy entrance.
HANDICAP ACCESSIBLE
Our property offers accessibility for guests needing additional assistance. Handicap parking and accessible entrances are located at all Mall entrances. Accessible restrooms are located in the food court and near Van's.
WHEELCHAIRS
If you are in need of a wheelchair during your visit, please visit the mall office, located at the food court entrance, near Champ's.  Wheelchairs are complementary but require a valid driver's license upon pick up.  

The mall office is open Monday through Friday from 8:30am to 5pm (closed from 12noon - 1pm for lunch).  If you wish to use a wheelchair outside of the mall office hours, please call Security at 904.269.1662.
Family
FAMILY RESTROOMS
For your convenience, you‚Äôll find family restrooms located next to the Food Court.
KIDDIE RIDES
Enjoy a fun and unique experience by riding one of Animal Rides rental. Located at the top of the Food Court, purchase tickets at the kiosk.  Must be under 275 pounds.  Children 5 years old and under must have an adult ride with them.
KIDX CLUB
Orange Park Mall offers a KidX club program with monthly events, exclusive discounts and more!
NURSING LOUNGE
For your convenience, we offer private nursing mother‚Äôs lounge located near the Women's restroom in the food court.

Sponsored by HCA Orange Park.
PLAY AREA
Take a break from shopping and let your little one enjoy some fun at the HCA Orange Park Play Area. Open to all children 42" and under.

Located near Rack Room Shoes.
STROLLERS
Push your little one around with ease in our of our strollers. Located at the Food Court and Old Navy entrance.  Rental rate is $6 for a single stroller.
BABY CHANGING STATIONS
For your convenience, baby changing stations are located in the family and women's restrooms.
SAFETY & SECURITY
FIRST AID
First-aid assistance can be provided at the mall office.  In the event of an emergency please dial 911, or locate the nearest Security Officer.  AED devices are located in all Security mobile vehicles.
LOST & FOUND
If you misplace an item, please call Security at (904) 269-1662.
SECURITY
Shop with peace of mind knowing our Security is here to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. If you need to contact Security at any time during your visit, please call 904-269-1662.
other amenities
ATMS
ATM machines are located at the Food Court, by Books-A-Million and by the AMC Entrance.
FIRE PIT
Enjoy the firepit, located on the patio, outside the food court.
VENDING MACHINES
Grab a cold drink from one of the Coca-Cola vending machines located throughout the property.
MALL WALKING
Orange Park Mall opens all entrances at 8:30am Monday - Saturday for anyone who would like to walk the mall.   On Sundays, entrances are open at 10am.
CELL PHONE CHARGING STATION
For your convenience, we offer recharging stations fit for most devices, located at Center Court, near Dillard's.
WIFI
Stay connected on-the-go by using complimentary Wi-Fi services throughout the mall.
about wpg
At wpg our vision is to create a world-class retail real estate operating platform. With value creation at the core of everything we do, we combine a diverse national portfolio with expertise across the entire shopping center sector to provide the strategy, support and space needed for retailers to thrive.
learn more

#post-##
.entry-header
about us
Orange Park Mall is Clay County‚Äôs premier shopping destination offering national brands and locally-owned specialty shops to residents and tourists alike. Orange Park Mall also hosts more than 30 events a year including, a monthly KidX Club event, car shows and and Photos with the Easter Bunny and Santa.
Connect with us on
Facebook
&
Instagram
and
sign up
to receive Orange Park Mall‚Äôs emails for the latest news and happenings!
photo gallery
PARKING & ACCESSIBILITY
bicycle parking
Bike racks are located at the Food Court entrance and the Old Navy entrance.
HANDICAP ACCESSIBLE
Our property offers accessibility for guests needing additional assistance. Handicap parking and accessible entrances are located at all Mall entrances. Accessible restrooms are located in the food court and near Van's.
WHEELCHAIRS
If you are in need of a wheelchair during your visit, please visit the mall office, located at the food court entrance, near Champ's.  Wheelchairs are complementary but require a valid driver's license upon pick up.  

The mall office is open Monday through Friday from 8:30am to 5pm (closed from 12noon - 1pm for lunch).  If you wish to use a wheelchair outside of the mall office hours, please call Security at 904.269.1662.
Family
FAMILY RESTROOMS
For your convenience, you‚Äôll find family restrooms located next to the Food Court.
KIDDIE RIDES
Enjoy a fun and unique experience by riding one of Animal Rides rental. Located at the top of the Food Court, purchase tickets at the kiosk.  Must be under 275 pounds.  Children 5 years old and under must have an adult ride with them.
KIDX CLUB
Orange Park Mall offers a KidX club program with monthly events, exclusive discounts and more!
NURSING LOUNGE
For your convenience, we offer private nursing mother‚Äôs lounge located near the Women's restroom in the food court.

Sponsored by HCA Orange Park.
PLAY AREA
Take a break from shopping and let your little one enjoy some fun at the HCA Orange Park Play Area. Open to all children 42" and under.

Located near Rack Room Shoes.
STROLLERS
Push your little one around with ease in our of our strollers. Located at the Food Court and Old Navy entrance.  Rental rate is $6 for a single stroller.
BABY CHANGING STATIONS
For your convenience, baby changing stations are located in the family and women's restrooms.
SAFETY & SECURITY
FIRST AID
First-aid assistance can be provided at the mall office.  In the event of an emergency please dial 911, or locate the nearest Security Officer.  AED devices are located in all Security mobile vehicles.
LOST & FOUND
If you misplace an item, please call Security at (904) 269-1662.
SECURITY
Shop with peace of mind knowing our Security is here to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. If you need to contact Security at any time during your visit, please call 904-269-1662.
other amenities
ATMS
ATM machines are located at the Food Court, by Books-A-Million and by the AMC Entrance.
FIRE PIT
Enjoy the firepit, located on the patio, outside the food court.
VENDING MACHINES
Grab a cold drink from one of the Coca-Cola vending machines located throughout the property.
MALL WALKING
Orange Park Mall opens all entrances at 8:30am Monday - Saturday for anyone who would like to walk the mall.   On Sundays, entrances are open at 10am.
CELL PHONE CHARGING STATION
For your convenience, we offer recharging stations fit for most devices, located at Center Court, near Dillard's.
WIFI
Stay connected on-the-go by using complimentary Wi-Fi services throughout the mall.
about wpg
At wpg our vision is to create a world-class retail real estate operating platform. With value creation at the core of everything we do, we combine a diverse national portfolio with expertise across the entire shopping center sector to provide the strategy, support and space needed for retailers to thrive.
